job.title: NET Full Stack Developer
job.description: <p><strong>** Eligibility to work in the U.S. without sponsorship (current or future) required</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>AUSTIN, TX or PENSACOLA, FL</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>As a Software Engineer, You will:</strong></p><p>Build new applications with a consistent framework to insure testability and maintainability.</p><ul><li>Work collaboratively with developers and product owners to decompose requirements into actionable tasks and insure timely features delivery.</li><li>Create technical design specifications and work with QA to align understanding of requirements in user stories and to develop system test plans.</li><li>Design and implement proof of concepts/components when required.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>What You'll Need:</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Computer Science or related field.</li><li>Strong understanding of software design patterns, data structures, and algorithms.</li><li><strong>4+ years of tracking experience developing enterprise level systems using C# and .NET Framework.</strong></li><li><strong>2+ years of front-end MVVM development experience in WPF.</strong> Experience with MVVM frameworks such as Prism or Caliburn Micro. Knowledge of UI toolkits such as DevExpress, Infragistics, Telerik is a plus.</li><li><strong>2+ years of SQL and relational database design or experience developing .NET applications with an RDBMS</strong></li><li>Good understanding of SOLID principles and how to develop clean, object-oriented, error-tolerant code using TDD and a unit testing framework such as MSTest, NUnit, or XUnit.</li><li>Experience working with Agile/Scrum methodologies.</li><li>Experience with source control tools such as Git.</li><li>Demonstrate a degree of creativity and problem-solving skills.</li><li>Excellent communications skills - facilitation, negotiation.</li><li>Good team player, hungry and self-starter that can work well in a team environment, proactive issue resolution with a positive attitude.</li><li>Have passion for learning new technologies and enhancing existing skills.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Preferred:</strong></p><ul><li>Experience with continuous integration, build processes and deployment tools like Azure DevOps, Jenkins, Teamcity, Octopus Deploy, docker/containers, etc.</li><li>Familiar with SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS)</li><li>Experience with Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) or gRPC&nbsp;is a plus</li></ul><p></p>
